name: Labor Tax
description: Instead of taxing sales, which can be circumvented by using vertical integration, we want use a sustainable tax model that does not punish the trading with other players, since we want to support open trade. Therefore, a labor tax is implemented. Based on the speciality, labor will be taxed more or less.

properties.Title: High Labor Tax
properties.UserDescription: Strong Labor Tax: 2,75 Euros for every 1000 Labor. Taxation only applied if total labor per day is larger than 25k. Strongly taxed specialities: tailoring, electronics, mechanics, industry, cooking, advanced cooking, baking, advanced baking, farming, logging

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

Count.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="LaborWorkOrderAction">Labor Added</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="LaborWorkOrderAction">Labor Added</ecoicon>: The amount of labor performed.

User.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

properties.Title: Labor Query
properties.UserDescription: allows a citizen to query how many labor they already invested in the last 24 hours

properties.Title: Medium Labor Tax
properties.UserDescription: Medium Labor Tax: 1,75 Euro for every 1000 Labor, only starting after 50k Labor. Specialities taxed: Campfire Cooking, Basic Engineering, Butchering, Smelting, Advanced Smelting, Fertilizers, Composites

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

properties.Title: Weak Labor Tax
properties.UserDescription: Professions that do a lot of labor will be taxed less. 0,75$ per 1000 Labor, applying after 75k labor a day. Weak tax professions: carpentry, pottery, masonry, glassworking, paper milling, oil drilling, milling, cutting edge cooking

properties.Title: Mining Labor Tax
properties.UserDescription: Miners pay especially little labor tax since they have to expend a lot of labor. 0,5$ per 1000 Labor, only counting after 75k labor has been expended.
